00019 #ifndef __TLM_INITIATOR_PORT_BASE_H__

00023 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024  * Includes
00025  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 //#include <systemc>
00029 
00030 #include "tlm_target_port_base.h"
00031 
00032 namespace tlm {
00033 
00034   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 
00047   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048   class tlm_initiator_port_base {
00049 
00050     typedef tlm_initiator_port_base this_type;
00051     typedef tlm_target_port_base target_port_type;
00052     
00053   public:
00054     
00055     //--------------
00056     // Constructor
00057     //--------------
00058     tlm_initiator_port_base() {
00059       // Adds the port itself to the reversed initiator port list
00060       m_reversed_initiator_port_list.push_back(this);
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064     //------------------------------------------
00066     //------------------------------------------
00068     
00070     inline void register_target_port(target_port_type * target_port) {
00071       m_target_port_list.push_back(target_port);
00072     }
00073 
00075     inline std::vector<target_port_type *>& get_target_port_list() {
00076       return(m_target_port_list);
00077     }
00078     
00080     inline void set_target_port_list(std::vector<target_port_type *>& target_port_list) {
00081       m_target_port_list = target_port_list;
00082     }
00083 
00084     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 
00087     inline void register_initiator_port(this_type * initiator_port) {
00088       m_initiator_port_list.push_back(initiator_port);
00089     }
00090 
00092     inline std::vector<this_type *>& get_initiator_port_list() {
00093       return(m_initiator_port_list);
00094     }
00095 
00097     inline void set_initiator_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& initiator_port_list) {
00098       m_initiator_port_list = initiator_port_list;
00099     }
00100 
00101     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 
00104     inline void reversed_register_initiator_port(this_type * initiator_port) {
00105       m_reversed_initiator_port_list.push_back(initiator_port);
00106     }
00107 
00109     inline std::vector<this_type *>& get_reversed_initiator_port_list() {
00110       return(m_reversed_initiator_port_list);
00111     }
00112 
00114     inline void set_reversed_initiator_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& initiator_port_list) {
00115       m_reversed_initiator_port_list = initiator_port_list;
00116     }
00117 
00119 
00120 
00121   protected:
00122 
00124 
00127     std::vector<target_port_type *> m_target_port_list;
00128     
00129     
00131 
00134     std::vector<this_type *> m_initiator_port_list;
00135 
00137 
00141     std::vector<this_type *> m_reversed_initiator_port_list;
00142 
00144 
00146     void create_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& port_list) {
00147       assert(port_list.size() > 0);      
00148       this_type& current_port = *port_list[(port_list.size()-1)];    
00149       // For all the registed initiator port of the port
00150       for (int i=0;i<(int)current_port.get_initiator_port_list().size();i++) {
00151         // register only other ports (the list contains the port itself)
00152         if (static_cast<this_type *>(&current_port) != current_port.get_initiator_port_list()[i]) {
00153           port_list.push_back(current_port.get_initiator_port_list()[i]); // register port
00154           this->create_port_list(port_list); // find again in the updated port list
00155         }
00156       }
00157     }
00158 
00159 
00160   };
00161 
00162 } // namespace tlm
